articles.title: SC to hear on July 11 fresh plea against appointment of Eknath Shinde as Maha CM
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Friday agreed to hear on July 11 a fresh plea of the Uddhav Thackeray led faction challenging appointment of Eknath Shinde as chief minister of Maharashtra.
articles.content:
